Mediocre at best! Chairs were dirty that you sat in that should have been a sign! Servers we're both rude put out if you asked for anything such as water refill or clean plate! Overcharged on the food we ordered and the food was very bland! Spicy eggplant was good mixed vegetables with chicken horrible with no flavor!
First time and last time! If you want the best Thai food in town go to WEERA on west Sahara
Not bad Thai. The lunch specials are priced very well. Tasty.

Two words: coconut juice. This sweet addition complemented the spicy potstickers (so yummy!) and savory pad see ew perfectly. Everything we ordered was delicious and enjoyable. I often order pad see ew but this was the first time my SO wanted to trade entrees with me. He had the pineapple rice which was great as well. Overall, this is a good option for Thai food in Vegas.

Went here with my thai friend for some noodle soup. This used to be the old L&L Hawaiian place, which I believe is now located in the old Diner car on Buffalo. I miss that diner, it was good food.

It's not a huge place, but its very clean. There were about 4 tables occupied. One waitress, and one person in the back cooking I believe. I decided to go with the beef Pad See Ew (I can never spell this right). My friend chose noodle soup plus a thai meal she said she can never find here. Don't ask me the name LOL. Later she said it was just OK. My Pad See Ew was really good, sweet flavor on the noodle without that bitterness that sometimes accompanies this when the noodle is overfried. 

I will come back, and I will try some other dishes. Easy, cheap cost, good food, good service. A winner in my book for what it is.

They never failed me. Food was delicious! I always ordered for pick up and they always have customers, the wait time is pretty good about 10 minutes, just right fo my commute or while checking out from Smith's. 

I tried all their curry, love them all but I like the red curry the most! Then the uber delish Pad se-eu and Pad thai. I kept coming back!! They are also open daily, a big plus!

All I eat is the beef noodle soup! You have to try it! It's a large portion and it always tastes the same. A very consistent place. Most servers are friendly but there is on server that should not leave their home lol
This place is the BOMB. I always order delivery from here and it's ALWAYS good. Pad See Ewe is amazing and I love the chicken noodle soup.

I have been doing take out since they opened and  the food is decent and by my house . However, I dined in and they are the laziest waiters ever. They don't listen they cop attitudes if you want water or anything . I will never dine in again !!! Bump them I'll rather dive further for better service .
I like this place always good never had a problem here . Except it just isn't close enough to my house it limits the times I go their.
Great food.. Super cheap! This is our new place to get delivery for work from now on.

Love the tom yum soup with shrimp and pad tai shrimp as well 
Enjoyable service.  
Started playing football games on the tv

Last night, I saw Paolo D.'s "check-in" to Komol, and I suddenly had a ridiculously crazy craving for their Herbal salad.  If I was pregnant, I would have made my husband drive to Komol just to pick up a week's supply. Unfortunately, I am not pregnant and due to my crazy soccer mom schedule I can't drive their myself. (I barely have time to write this review!) 

Anyways, I was still craving some Thai food so I settled for Thai Style Noodle House for lunch since it is minutes from my own.  I have been here twice, ordering take-out both times.  The restaurant itself is decorated really cute.  but take-out is just so much more convenient for me.  Some of my favorite items are Pad See-eu with beef, Green Curry with chicken, and the Panang with avocado and shrimp.  These dishes are full of flavor and the spice levels are just enough to clear my sinuses and make me sweat/ glisten.  My kids enjoy the chicken chow mein (i know, i know...that isn't Thai food).  There is a good amount of chicken and veggies that they will actually eat!

The items that I did not really care for were the Beef Stew noodle soup and the Chicken Larb.  They were flavorful, however it was just too salty for me to eat more than 2 bites. I chugged my Thai iced tea in seconds, and chased it with a gallon of water. In fact, just thinking about it is giving me a salt headache.

** Note: some reviews state that there is no restroom. There is one around back.  It isn't inside the actual restaurant, but there is one.  It isn't the most convenient location, but there is no need to torture your bladder. **

The service is quick and friendly, the price is very affordable, and it is around the corner so I'll definitely be back.  (at least until Komol starts offering delivery!)
What a great find, amazing Thai cuisine at prices that seem too good to be true, compare to other quality Thai eateries. Lacking in service a bit but then I guess somethings gotta give :-)
Thai heaven .... The food is delicious... Enuff said. I thought i had to go alllll the way to spring mountain location but not no more.. Awesome that they are here and the place is   Busy.
Can't get anyone on the phone to place a pick-up order. Doesn't matter how good the food is if you can't buy it!

I love this restaurant and was surprised that they had one on this side of town. Came here for lunch with some friends and it does not disappoint despite the difference in location. 

I love how cheap the food is and everything was great. I went with what I usually get which is the S9 3 companion chicken with papaya salad and sticky rice. It was close to the price of lunch which is still great. 

One of my friends ordered this crispy noodle dish which was really good. She's a regular so they also brought out extra noodles for her because she likes to take it home and make another meal out of it. For the price of it and making it into two meals I thought it was great. Next time I will come back for lunch and try a different dish. 

Overall, the ambience is the same as the other locations. Nice and Asian feel to it. The bathrooms were clean and the service was great. I definitely will be coming back in the future.
